executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Execute comprehensive test suite including: unit tests for components, integration tests for authentication flow, API route tests, state management tests, and end-to-end user flow tests. Generate detailed error reports with severity classification (critical, major, minor), exact error messages, stack traces, reproduction steps, affected components, and performance metrics. Include screenshots for UI-related errors and code coverage statistics. Use test credentials: Username: test@example.com, Password: your-test-password
